tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FinancialRatios (
 ratio_name VARCHAR(50),
 ratio_formula VARCHAR(100),
 calculation_method VARCHAR(100),
 data_source VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE financial_ratios (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ratio_name VARCHAR(50),
  value DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE performance_indicators (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  indicator_name VARCHAR(50),
  value DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE FinancialRatios (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ratio_name VARCHAR(255),
  formula VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PerformanceIndicators (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  indicator_name VARCHAR(255),
  calculation_formula VARCHAR(255),
  weight DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE DataExtractions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  extraction_name VARCHAR(255),
  criteria TEXT,
  last_extraction_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE financial_ratios (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    ratio_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    formula VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE performance_indicators (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    indicator_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    formula VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    baseline_value FLOAT,
    target_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE financial_data (
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    company_id INT NOT NULL,
    revenue FLOAT,
    expenses FLOAT,
    net_income FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (date, company_id)
);

CREATE TABLE company_info (
    company_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    industry VARCHAR(100),
    founded_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255)
);
